name: Hero's Will
body:
# Hero's Will
Face down endless excitement in Shoe String Softworks' best title yet.  In a gripping single player experience, you play has a heroic @ that has been sent on a quest for glory and gold!  Fight off hordes of the undead and adapt to an unlivable environment as you crawl through a labyrinth full of unexpected turns and twists.

Play Hero's Will today! Available through Steem!

### Support or Contact
Submit bugs reports 2 yer mom
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
